# Awesome Client-Side GPU

A curated list of GPU-accelerated zero-knowledge cryptography resources.

## Libraries

- [icicle](https://github.com/ingonyama-zk/icicle) - GPU acceleration for ZK proofs
- [webgpu-msm](https://github.com/example/webgpu-msm) - WebGPU multi-scalar multiplication
- [gpu-ntt](https://github.com/example/gpu-ntt) - GPU-based Number Theoretic Transform

## Papers

- [Fast MSM on GPUs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2301.12345) - Multi-scalar multiplication optimization
- [WebGPU for Crypto](https://example.com/paper.pdf) - WebGPU cryptographic primitives

## Blog Posts

- [GPU Proving in Production](https://blog.example.com/gpu-proving) - Real-world GPU proving
